div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: During the time of our mandated school closure due to the COVID-19 virus outbreak, Bloomfield Schools will be offering school lunches to our students. We will be following...
Preschool Paraprofessional Opening Bloomfield Community Schools has an employment opportunity for a Preschool Paraprofessional for the 2020- 2021 school year. This...

div.p: Bloomfield Families, Final packets are ready for pick up. They can be picked up anytime between 8am to 4pm. If you are having your lunch delivered, we will deliver your packets with your lunches. May 8th will be the last day of school. Please return all textbooks and library books. Thanks
FFA has a wide variety of plants available for sale in their greenhouse! $1/plant, $4/4 pack. Call or text Brooke Schmeckpeper at 402-651-4953 for more information or to set up a time to come shop.
20 ft bleacher wood for sale. Please contact Mr. Alexander at the high school for more information. 402-373-4800
Just a reminder when filling out your lunch form for Wednesday, April 22, please indicate whether you want chicken bites or orange chicken. Thank you

Please come help celebrate the class of 2020 each night from 8:00 to 8:20, tonight through the 24th at the Knox County fairgrounds ​as we throw on the stadium lights for 20 minutes for the class of 2020. Please practice appropriate social distancing at all times.

Bloomfield Schools is closed due to the COVID-19 crisis for the remainder of the school year. We will continue to deliver our alternative learning/meals for the remainder of the school year in our current delivery model. Please stay safe and healthy!
